title: 24HRS
content:
here is a face I just finished for my thesis. you can check it out a little more fully at cubanica.com

comments.content: would this be considered an "well articulated marker" face? I like it too.

It looks to me very much like bent neon tubing, which would explain the name.   
   
The only alteration I would suggest would be to shorten the lc "t" a bit. I'd like to see it a fraction shorter than the fully ascending characters.   
   
David

Are you posting this for critique?   
   
FYI, open announcements are more   
appropriate on the "News & Events" board.   
   
Cheers.

Huh. I'm surprised that I like it!   
   
Joe: If a face is released, is it not worth critiquing?   
   
hhp
